name: AffiliationById
description: Returns associated data for the specified affiliation Id, like name and implementation, for example.

X-PROVIDER-API-AppKey.description: The AppKey configured by the merchant (optional configuration)

X-PROVIDER-API-AppToken.description: The AppToken configured by the merchant (optional configuration)

Content-Type.description: The Media type of the body of the request.  Default value for payment provider protocol is application/json

Accept.description: Media type(s) that is/are acceptable for the response. Default value for payment provider protocol is application/json
